channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Elmbridge court roundabout, 25th September
item.description:
The white lines around this busy roundabout are now so faded they are difficult to see even in daylight. I did report this last year but you said inspection would take place but now nearly 10 months later nothing has been done and they have worsened. They need urgently repainting.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Sunk road, 25th September
item.description:

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 25th September
item.description:

item.title: Grass cutting to be done, 25th September
item.description:
Alongside 1 Tern Court Rookery Rd (lamppost 21) this grass needs cutting regularly as it was done just the once this year. TBC used to do this and maintain it regularly. Small patch gets done (last photo) by contractors monthly opposite but the bigger parts do not get cut, why ? Please maintain these areas as they used to be done in previous years. Looks so untidy and scruffy.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rookery Road, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
